feature.label: IdentityIQ Deployment Accelerator Feature
feature.description:
This feature provides functionality around the SailPoint portfolio of products. It provides features such as - Import/export of various configuration objects - Rule editor with syntax checking - Workflow editing (including features such as rename step) - IdentityNow transform editing
Please check the License Agreement; this tool is worked on in our spare time and as such could contain bugs that may not get fixed in a timely fashion. All questions relating to the plugin should be entered on the Compass 'Deployment Accelerator' forum here: https://community.sailpoint.com/community/identityiq/forums/
